Are you starting a business, or you are interested in extending the product portfolio of your company? 

We can help each other. All people around the world deserve beautiful and cosy home with design furniture – do you agree? We will be pleased to shake hands with somebody who declares the same principles as we do – high-quality goods and maximum loyalty to our business partner. 

 

   


Together with our business partners,
we currently operate
in 10 countries across Europe.


We sell furniture
that we design, produce
and pack as well.


Business partnership with us 
is based on rules
and fairness.



Let’s help each other establish a successful business

What do we offer?

✓ Products that we produce by ourselves – more than 1 000 customers will confirm their quality,

✓ above-standard wholesale prices,

✓ comprehensive product feed,

✓ design photos of our products,

✓ wholesale seasonal sales,

✓ advice and support from our wholesale manager Michal,

✓ and most importantly – fair and open approach

ENTER INTO PARTNERSHIP

The more you sell, the greater wholesale margin you are about to receive. We enable our partners to grow so that they could become VIP partners or even ULTRA VIP club members.

 


Business partners are always equal

Therefore, we expect that:

✓ you will be as loyal and open as we are,

✓ you will respect our prices,

✓ you will not use our photographs and other materials without permission,

✓ in case you have a good idea or – contrarily – troubles, you will tell us about it. 



Where to begin?

1. Fill in a contact form and give us further details about your company.

2. Our wholesale manager Michal will get back to you.

3. You will be provided with product feed, together we will agree on a partnership contract and you can start selling.

Fill the contact form



Any questions? Ask straight away! 

The wholesale manager Michal Krčmařík will answer all of your questions. Contact him via E-Mail: sales@benlemi.com.
